entries.title: This fake Pokemon NFT game just wants to take over your Windows PC
entries.description: Fake Pokemon NFT game could just give fraudsters access to target devices.

entries.title: Hisense’s all mini-LED lineup for 2023 is led by its brightest TV yet
entries.description: The mini-LED TV lineup Hisense unveiled at CES 2023 ranges from an ultra bright 85-inch screen with an astonishing number of dimming zones, to an ultra-affordable 50-incher.

entries.title: Russia hacker group hijacks USB attacks by other criminals
entries.description: Turla detected using a decade-old infection to spy on targets in Ukraine, researchers claim.

entries.title: The VSCode Marketplace is pretty easy to hack with malicious extensions
entries.description: There are very few roadblocks to uploading malware to the marketplace, researchers warn.

entries.title: This Nintendo Switch controller reminds me of the Gamecube's iconic wireless pad
entries.description: There's a new Nintendo Switch controller, by manufacturer NYXI, that looks suspiciously like one of the Gamecube's finest.

entries.title: Chick-fil-A customer accounts may have been hacked
entries.description: Chick-fil-A confirms hacked accounts and tells users to change passwords, but there's little detail on exactly what happened.

entries.title: Microsoft now wants to add ChatGPT to Word, email
entries.description: Despite concerns that artificial intelligence isn’t where it needs to be, Microsoft is pushing ahead.

entries.title: We now know why Street Fighter 6 is launching later than we thought
entries.description: Street Fighter 6 is launching later than many thought, but the game's producer has now explained why.

entries.title: Marc Benioff hints more Salesforce layoffs could be coming
entries.description: At the start of the year, Salesforce said it would be looking to cut 10% of its staff. Now, that figure is climbing.

entries.title: Adobe is almost definitely using your content to train AI
entries.description: Adobe reported to be training its AI with user-generated content.

entries.title: AMD’s rocky ride continues as Ryzen 7600X CPU firmware goes seriously wrong
entries.description: Problems with Ryzen processors have cropped up elsewhere, not to mention RDNA 3 graphics cards.

entries.title: NordPass adds passwordless online authentication
entries.description: NordPass is moving with the times by supporting the new technologies set to replace passwords for good.

entries.title: iOS 17 and iPadOS 17 could have features cut thanks to xrOS - but macOS 14 could thrive
entries.description: While it's rumored to be a quiet 2023 for Apple, could we still see redesigned widgets come to macOS 14 regardless?

entries.title: BlackBerry is getting to grips with Rust at last
entries.description: Blackberry partners with Elektrobit to turbocharge software-defined vehicles with Rust.

entries.title: You can now play the original prototype for Left 4 Dead in all its zombie goodness
entries.description: New map sources for Counter-Strike: Condition Zero have been leaked, revealing the iconic start of Left 4 Dead.

entries.title: Netflix promises to grow ad-supported subscription plan despite slow uptake
entries.description: Netflix has remained steadfast in its commitment to supporting its new cheaper subscription plan.

entries.title: Leaked Samsung S23 Ultra's storage upgrade could be bad news for your wallet
entries.description: More leaks have suggested that the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra and Plus models will start at 256GB – which could mean a price hike.

entries.title: Streamer defeats two Elden Ring bosses simultaneously by dancing
entries.description: Streamer MissMikka is doing two Elden Ring playthroughs at the same time in the funkiest possible way.

entries.title: Watch out AMD – Nvidia could boost GPU performance by up to 30% with AI
entries.description: The question is: if rumored AI tuning for drivers is true, will it be limited to certain Nvidia graphics cards?

entries.title: Amazon S3 will now encrypt data by default
entries.description: AES-256 encryption has been a feature of AWS for over a decade, but now admins needn’t pay it a second thought.

entries.title: Hackers are using ChatGPT to write malware
entries.description: ChatGPT is being abused to build malware and dark web marketplaces, experts warn.

entries.title: Why I'm not worried about Marvel's reported Phase 5 release date changes
entries.description: Marvel's forthcoming TV show slate is undergoing some significant changes, according to industry insiders.

entries.title: Top European airlines confirm customer accounts hacked
entries.description: Sensitive data taken from two airlines in Europe, but payment data seems to be safe.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams could soon be coming to a massive screen near you
entries.description: Hisense is hoping to appeal to a wider, global audience, with Microsoft Teams-enabled displays as large as 86 inches.

entries.title: How Device as a Service can help you flex up or down
entries.description: Three ways DaaS could be the extra push your business needs to succeed.
